children.text: VineLink Mobile End User License Agreement

By clicking ‘Accept’ you confirm that: 
 
 1. You have read and agree to the following terms of use and you understand the use of this app is subject to these terms. 

 2. This app is strictly provided as a service to victims of crime and other concerned citizens by Appriss Incorporated. 

 3. The information contained on the app is for personal use and any commercial use of this information is strictly prohibited. You may not collect, sell, offer for sale, modify, reproduce, display, publicly perform, import, distribute, retransmit or otherwise use the content from this app in any way, without the express written permission of Appriss Incorporated. 

 4. You will not depend on this app for your protection or for any other reason whatsoever. Maintain your awareness and keep in contact with your advocate, attorney, and local law enforcement officers and agencies assigned to your case and/or in your community.

 5. This app is offered for free, with hope that you will find it useful. However, Appriss or its employees, directors, shareholders, advisors or anyone acting on its behalf shall not be liable to you or to any third party, for any reason whatsoever, as a result of the use of the company’s product or service. You hereby irrevocably release all of the above from any liability of any kind, for any consequence arising from use of the app or its associated services.
